channel.title: Los Santos on Weazel News RP
channel.description: Recent content in Los Santos on Weazel News RP

item.title: The Weazely Impersonation at the LSPD
item.description: This afternoon a report came in that a Weazel News van driven by one Opie pulled up to the LSPD building and a second person in the van opened fire on two police officers, Farva and Brown. Officer Farva was able to stun Jackson using his taser while Opie was able to drive off. The two police officers gave chase and when Opie attempted to lose his followers down an alley way instead found himself stuck and proceeded to open fire upon the officers.

item.title: Homelessness Plagues the City
item.description: At the beginning of this piece Weazel News wanted to learn more about the state of homelessness in the Los Santo’s. We wanted to understand what brought the people to the state of being homeless and how the city could step up as a community and help solve the problem. What we didn’t expect is the wide range of answers and opinions on the topic as well as the stories we heard from all walks of life.
